snippet: The hostage, Warren Weinstein, a 70-year-old development consultant, was shown making an emotional appeal to President Obama to negotiate for his release.
abstract: Al Qaeda releases Internet video showing American aid expert Warren Weinstein, who was kidnapped in August 2011 in Pakistan, making an emotional appeal to Pres Obama to negotiate his release; analysts describe video as a jihadist counter against the wave of publicity that marked the first anniversary of the death of Osama bin Laden.
lead_paragraph: The hostage, Warren Weinstein, a 70-year-old development consultant, was shown making an emotional appeal to President Obama to negotiate for his release.

headline.seo: Kidnapped American Appears in Qaeda Video
headline.main: Kidnapped American Makes Appeal to Obama in Qaeda Video
headline.print_headline: Kidnapped American Makes Appeal to Obama in Qaeda Video
